text:
The following code exists within a jsp:
When processed by tomcat, the page displays:
Notice, the image tags are gone, yet they're substituted with the appropriate number of blanks. Here's what's really weird: if I remove the ? and the args from the href, all work fine. Or, if I put the ? and the args back in the href and remove the first tag, all is well. To test my theory, I saved the unedited page as html and it works perfectly. Somewhat strange - any insight would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
